course_name: Building Futures: Advanced Structures and Software
description: This course develops skills in the analysis, synthesis and evaluation of contemporary advances in structural systems, environmental design and construction technologies. Students create integrated and advanced structural, environmental and construction solutions for a studio project through exploratory research seminars and assignments that also develop skills in investigation and innovation suited to future design practice and global challenges.
restricted: Admission to the Master of Architecture. Study abroad students must seek Head of School's permission to enrol.
